title: Intern Meredith Crushed Her Goodbye Rap!
description:
It’s sort of a Bert Show tradition…it started back in the day and it’s resurfaced in all its glory the past couple of years. We have interns in studio, and on their last days, they would rap about what they learned from the show.
First up is Intern Meredith!
